name: fele felix
description:
part of HitsPlayTime 2018

YOU NEED GAMEPADS AND FRIENDS

____________________________

The game was made by chouqi janvier tymus nalhue and boordaf

_____________________________

FeleFelix is a local multi player racing game set in space !

grab you friends and your gamepads and go on a crazy race on alien planets, maybe you'll find something useful at the end of your journey !

CONTROLS  for a xbox 360 gamepad

Left joystick : direction

Button X : car power (either a boost or a bump)

Button A : jump from one car to another (careful, you could miss your target)

Button B : brakes

Back : restart

The game only runs on pc and is full of bugs, if you're stuck during a race, you can press back to reload the level
